content: s s prout carf designed by lisa gentry materials 1 76 oz/50 g super bulky yarn used in pattern moda dea swerve 50% virgin wool 50% polyester 1 76 oz/50g 30 yds/28m per ball 1 ball #7150 flirt or 1 ball #7130 jeans yarn needle crochet hook us m-13 9 mm skill finished measurements length about 100″ instructions step 1 chain 15 step 2 stitch through 5th chain from hook yarn over draw yarn through the stitch 2 loops remaining on hook step 3 skip 4 chains stitch through next chain yarn over draw yarn through the stitch 3 loops remaining on hook step 4 repeat step 3 4 loops remaining on hook step 5 yarn over draw yarn through all 4 loops on hook 1 loop remaining on hook copyright 2007 ©lisa gentry hook & needle designs llc - 212 spruce drive - step 6 chain 25 chatham la 71226 www hookandneedledesigns com repeat steps 2 to 6 for pattern until yarn is gone or to desire length end with step 5 fasten_off weave in ends
